rooms.description: A welcoming open space with a Bohemian-inspired decor using colorful textures and patterns. It includes storage and seating.
Open-plan area merging living and dining spaces. Features large windows for natural light with Bohemian decorative elements such as eclectic furniture and art.
A modern yet Bohemian kitchen with vibrant backsplash designs. It integrates efficient storage solutions and an open layout to connect with the dining area.
A dedicated space designed for immersive viewing experiences, equipped with soundproofing, ambient lighting, and a retractable screen. Decor incorporates Bohemian textures to add warmth.
Spacious master bedroom featuring natural light through large windows; decor is Bohemian with layered fabrics and handcrafted accents. It includes built-in closets for ample storage.
Cozy bedroom designed in a Bohemian style with vibrant textiles and wall art; adequate space for privacy and comfort.
Additional bedroom tailored to Bohemian aesthetics with decorative touches and functional storage solutions.
Well-designed bathroom with modern fixtures complemented by Bohemian accents. It includes a ventilation system for moisture control.

openings.location: Between Entrance Hallway and Living Room/Dining Area
Between Living Room/Dining Area and Kitchen

vastu_principles.description: North or east facing for inviting positive energy.
Rooms arranged to balance the five elements. Living spaces and home theater are oriented towards the south for optimal light distribution.

building_norms.description: Plan adheres to local building codes with appropriate setbacks and open spaces.
Incorporates fire exits, smoke detectors in corridors, and adherence to safety standards.
